law.catch_line: A person who negligently or without reasonable cause fails to provide any information as required un...

text.section: A person who negligently or without reasonable cause fails to provide any information as required under this article is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $500.

This section does not apply to:
the alcoholic beverage tax;
the Maryland estate tax; or
the Maryland generation-skipping transfer tax.
